        <description>MS Azure Global Utils</description>
        <name>MSAzureGlobalUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MSAzureGlobalUtils = Class.create();
MSAzureGlobalUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	PROPERTIES: {
		INSTANCE_NAME: 'instance_name',
		INSTANCE_DOMAIN: 'glide.channelproxy.instance_domain_suffix'
	},
	
	encrypt: function (value){
		var glideEncrypter = new GlideEncrypter();
		return glideEncrypter.encrypt(value);
	},
	
	decrypt: function (value){
		var glideEncrypter = new GlideEncrypter();
		return glideEncrypter.decrypt(value);
	},
	
	getBrowserURL: function() {
		var transaction = GlideTransaction.get();
		var baseURL =  transaction.getBaseURL();
		return GlideStringUtil.stripSuffix(baseURL, "/");
	},
	
	getInstanceURL: function() {
		var instanceName = gs.getProperty(this.PROPERTIES.INSTANCE_NAME);
		var instanceDomain = gs.getProperty(this.PROPERTIES.INSTANCE_DOMAIN, 'service-now.com');
		var url = 'https://' + instanceName + '.' + instanceDomain;
		return GlideStringUtil.stripSuffix(url, "/");
	},

    type: 'MSAzureGlobalUtils'
};]]></script>
